events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated in days.
The issue has been categorized under 'Delivery Delay' due to the customer's report of late shipping and tracking problems.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. to assist the customer with their delivery delay issue.
Hello! This is Lisa from customer support. I understand your order is late, and I'm here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 879654321, and the tracking number is TRACK1234567890. The last update was five days ago.
Thank you for the details. We've contacted the shipping company and arranged for expedited processing of your package. You should receive an updated status within 24 hours.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate you prioritizing my delivery, and I look forward to the update.
We see that your package has now been delivered successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure youâ€™re completely satisfied with your recent delivery and our support during this delay.
We are closing this case now as the delivery issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
You will receive a short survey shortly to provide feedback on your experience with our support team.
